reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nicely constructed - ordered a 2nd set
reviews.reviewText: Dimensions were exactly as described. One review mentioned the legs being plastic, which is true. But it seems the outer surface of the leg tube is a metal sleeve around a plastic core, and the feet themselves seem to be a very hard plastic of some sort with a hard chrome-colored surface cover that threads into the plastic core. The visual appearance is good to me and the chrome-color plastic feet are not distracting.The threads from the leg into the glass inserts are quite snug and provide a solid connection. The threads on the feet are a little looser but this resulted in only a slight amount of play at nearly full extension.These came with adhesive silicone rubber pads for the feet which made it stick quite well to my desk surface and also stabilized it well when I stacked two shelves on top of each other. I did not notice any appreciable wobble with the two stacked shelves and a small amount of weight (less than 10 pounds), and with the feet fully retracted.For reference I measure 3 1/8 inch from the underside of the glass down to the desktop with the feet fully retracted.Also note that the adjustable feet are perfect for a surface that is not completely level. I was able to adjust one foot to compensate for a desk insert and get no rocking at all.I have set these shelves up flat for my application. However, if I had planned to extend the legs to different lengths to get an inclined surface, I don't think it would have worked out for me. The feet bottoms are flat, and if front and back legs are not extended to the same length on a level surface, then the feet no longer lie flat on the desktop.All in all, this is a very nice unit, especially for a reasonable price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This look really nice. Simple. Elegant. It is very useful that the legs can be individually adjusted. My stands are bridging two desks and the adjustment allows me to optimize placement - with the lower table needing just a little extra height so the stand sits solidly. Would buy again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Minimalist and pretty stands
reviews.reviewText: Easy to assemble they look very light in the room and hold a considerable amount of weight. I have one holding up my computer screen, and the other one is holding up my printer. I have electronics underneath the computer screen, and I have my spare paper tucked under my printer now, so this eliminates a lot of clutter on my desk And gives me a little extra storage space . A+.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These work well , look great and are pretty sturdy,,nice value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for changing living space into office space
reviews.reviewText: Many of us have had to rework living space into office space over the last year or two. I, personally, needed a space to perch a monitor so it was a bit more ergonomic. This two pack worked out great. I ended up sharing the second stand with my son.Fairly easy to assemble, to be sure. Its not the greatest build quality, but for what I paid, I certainly feel like I got my money's worth. The glass and metal look was certainly appealing, at least to me. Certainly sturdy enough to accommodate my 24" monitor. And it absolutely does what I bought it to do. Lifts my monitor up to a more user friendly level. Would not hesitate to recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stylish and Sturdy
reviews.reviewText: The heights are adjustable, plus they are sturdy and easy to set up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly as advertised- great studry product
reviews.reviewText: This product seems to be well-built and like it will last as long as you need it to. I’ve used a lot of the metal items of similar function, and they also all seem to have give to them, and can create imbalance and an sturdiness for the monitor, allowing it to wiggle with any disruption of the work surface. This is so well-made has very nice rubber pads that prevent any slippage even on top of a glass desk although the leg material, it’s self, not the pieces that screw into the glass are made of a silver plastic. It doesn’t seem to change the performance, durability or sturdiness of the product. It actually may enhance the lightness of the product , due to using it on a standing desk with a weight limit of 100 pounds weight was important to me. The glass is very thick and therefore doesn’t seem to be an issue of it breaking and overall a well-made thoughtful designed product I would order again, or suggest to my friends, and actually have already.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elegant, easy to assemble, great value
reviews.reviewText: Product needs no instructions for assembly, but if you are a 1-star reviewer contemplating reordering:1. Be cognizant of cross-threading (always) but was not a problem on 8/8 legs attached to the base.2. Do all manipulations of the threaded rod by hand threading/tightening (one end inserts into base, the other into the leg)3. Turn until contact with the base, then half turn more. Do not tighten like the lugnuts on your car.4. Apply non-skid pads.5. Adjust height by turning the base at the foot of the leg. I didn't, but it is easy if you wish.I positioned 2 back-to-back to create a near-seamless platform for my wifi access point and mini-computer beneath the console that supports my TV. Very elegant. I chose BLACK so that power strip and cabling would be screened.Would definitely buy again.
Me puedes encantó que es de vidrio y está muy resistente.
Hands down this is one of my best Amazon purchases. Got 2 of the glass stands. Super easy to put together. Looks awesome plus the legs are adjustable height which is super handy

reviews.reviewTitle: Excellent product, works well and classy!
reviews.reviewText: Knew why I ordered it and it turned out classier than expected. Happy that it fits my 2 24” monitors perfectly.
Muy buenas mesas de apoyo para montar en cualquier espacio y ayudar a organizar cosas. En el tiempo que las he ocupado me parecen muy resistentes y de muy bonito aspecto. Fáciles se armar

The glass is very nice and look very good on my desk. The metal legs are low quality and you can see the low quality on close inspection. Took off one star on "sturdiness" cuz honestly I'm a little worried about the legs, especially when fully extended, but they look ok at a distance and they do what they're supposed to, and so far holds my laptop and monitor very well with no wobbles or sliding. Overall very happy with this product.
